DOC.brief_summary: ABSTRACT : Objective : To evaluate efficacy dexamethasone labor duration establish whether dexamethasone play role short duration interval initiation labor induction begin active phase primigravida full-term pregnancy . Methods : case control study include 86 primigravida full term pregnancy classify two group : The participant Group I receive prefilled syringe two milliliter ( 8 mg ) Dexamethasone intramuscular , participant Group II receive Dexamethasone cervical ripening agent . Key Words : Dexamethasone ; post-term pregnancy ; induction labor .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Of Intra-muscular Administration Dexamethasone Induction Labour
DOC.detailed_description: METHODS : This retrospective clinical trial conduct Department Obstetrics Gynecology , Faculty Medicine , Cairo University , period August 2014 May 2015 . The study protocol approve Scientific Research Committee , inform consent obtain participant . Each participant randomly assign computer list Group I ( Dexamethasone group ( n=43 ) group II ( control group ( N=43 ) . No cervical ripening agent use induction labour trial . Methodology detail : I . The participant Dexamethasone Group receive prefilled syringe two milliliter ( 8 mg ) Dexamethasone intramuscular , participant placebo Group receive Dexamethasone cervical ripening agent . All participant group randomly assign computer list . ( Haijavandi et. , al 2013 ) II . After six hour initial dose , labour induction start via Oxytocin use follow protocol : 1 . Initial dose oxytocin ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... . 1 2 milliliter international unit/min . 2 . Increase interval ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... 30 minute . 3 . Dosage increment ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... .1 2 milliliter international unit/min . 4 . Usual dose good labour ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... .8 to12 milliliter international unit/min . 5 . Maximum dose………………… ... ... ... ... ... ... .30 milliliter international unit/min . ( Anne Biringer et. , al 2013 ) . III . The interval initiation induction begin active phase labour record ( cervical dilatation 4 cm plus 3 forceful contraction 10-minute span last 40-60 Sec ) . IV . Partographic representation progression active phase labour : 1 . Frequency duration uterine contraction . 2 . Cervical dilatation record every two hour per vaginal examination . 3 . Station position fetal head note time . V. After delivery : - 1 . The duration first stage labor record . ( Partographic representation participant ) . 2 . The duration second stage labor record . 3 . The duration placental separation record . 4 . The neonatal outcome record APGAR score . 5 . Any postpartum maternal adverse effect note ( e.g . vital sign abnormality , maternal postpartum hemorrhage ) . Primary outcome : duration induction begin active phase . Secondary outcome : -Duration first stage .
DOC.criteria: Singleton pregnancy . Primigravida . Postterm gestation i.e . 41 week . Sure , reliable date . Favorable cervix Bishop score 7 great . Longitudinal lie . Cephalic presentation ( Vertex ) . Abnormal presentation . Multigravida . Multiple pregnancy . Active phase labour . Cephalopelvic disproportion . History medical disorder . History previous myomectomy operation . Known contraindication hypersensitivity Dexamethasone . Current fetal distress . Current maternal fetal disorder e.g . Diabetes mellitus ; Pregnancy induce hypertension , fetal growth retardation . Over distended abdomen e.g . fetal macrosomia polyhydramnios suggest ultrasound estimate fetal weight expert hand . Significant vaginal bleeding .
